item.title: July 2019 Update: Pivoting onto Blazor
item.author: run@superdotnet.run (Mike-EEE)
item.description: I suppose we can call this the July and August update since it is so late in July. Serializer Last I checked in, I believe I was bragging over the work and direction of working on the serializer.
